alert.note: Alert for Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 7:47PM CDT until June 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR EASTERN OLIVER COUNTY... At 747 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Washburn, or 29 miles north of Mandan, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sanger, Price and Cross Ranch State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
